data.title: Steps
data.solution:
const N = readline() // number of feet per step person 1 takes
const M = readline() // number of feet per step person 2 takes
const D = readline() // number of miles the two people walk

const feet = D * 5280 // convert the miles into feet

const numSteps1 = feet/N // number of steps person 1 takes
const numSteps2 = feet/M // number of steps person 2 takes
const difference = Math.round(Math.abs(numSteps1 - numSteps2))

console.log(difference)
data.statement:
Two people walk along the same road, but with different step sizes.  Find the difference in the number of steps it takes them to walk the same distance.

The number of feet in a mile is <<5280>>.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
read M:int
read D:int
write difference
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>> An integer [[N]] for the stride length of person 1 in feet per steps.
<<Line 2>> An integer [[M]] for the stride length of person 2 in feet per steps.
<<Line 3>> An integer [[D]] for the number of miles the two people walked.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1>> An integer of the difference in the number of steps between the two people, rounded to the nearest step.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Two people walk along the same road, but with different step sizes. Find the difference in the number of steps it takes them to walk the same distance.

The number of feet in a mile is 5280.
Input
Line 1 An integer N for the stride length of person 1 in feet per steps.
Line 2 An integer M for the stride length of person 2 in feet per steps.
Line 3 An integer D for the number of miles the two people walked.
Output
Line 1 An integer of the difference in the number of steps between the two people, rounded to the nearest step.
Constraints
Example
Input
1
2
1
Output
2640
